channel.title: [PI] Cache Help [PI]
channel.description:
Errm ok. The cache is fine and everything and it works 100% but the question is:
[b][u]When i do an Update is there a way to make the cache update with someone else's computer/[/u][/b]
This is because im trying to make it like what Jagex does and when they update you don't need to delete the cache to download the new one. Also i don't want to be making a Jar for every update i do, it gets annoying as well...
